name: HSP_BKT_SRCHG_HX
description: Surcharge history information. Stores all the data that can go into HSP_BKT_SURCHARGE by the date and time that it happened.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bucket record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SURCHARGE_CHAN_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant that the surcharge changed.

columns.name: SURCHARGE_COMMENT
columns.description: This item stores the comment entered by the user when the surcharge is overridden or the comment generated by the system when the surcharge is assigned.

columns.name: SURCHARGE_UPDATE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores whether the user or the system updated the surcharge

columns.name: SURCHARGE_EFF_DT
columns.description: This item stores the effective date of the surcharge as of the instant of the surcharge change.

columns.name: SURCHARGEABLE_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the surchargeable amount on the bucket as of the instant of the surcharge change.

columns.name: SURCHARGE_PERCENT
columns.description: This item stores the percent of the surchargeable that applies to the surcharge as of the instant of the surcharge change.

columns.name: SURCHARGE_HX_AMOUNT
columns.description: This item stores the amount of the surcharge as of the instant of the surcharge change.

columns.name: SRCHG_HX_RULE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the rule that was last used to determine the surcharge percent as of the instant of the surcharge change.

columns.name: SRCHG_HX_RULE_ID_RULE_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the name of the hospital billing workqueue rule.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account with which the liability bucket is associated.

columns.name: SURCHARGE_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user who changed the surcharge.

columns.name: SURCHARGE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
